title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mary Kay Cabot on Jimmy G Rumors, Watson Suspension, Baker Divorce
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mary Kay Cabot on Jimmy G Rumors, Watson Suspension, Baker Divorce
description:
First, Colin explains why Aaron Rodgers publicly criticizing his young receivers is a bad omen for the Packers, and if the Steelers should go ahead and start hometown hero Kenny Pickett in Week 1.

Then, longtime Browns beat writer Mary Kay Cabot joins Colin to discuss if the Browns should sign Jimmy Garoppolo if Deshaun Watson faces a lengthy suspension (16:00), what length of suspension the Browns are preparing for (19:00), if the locker room is prepared to handle the new dysfunction (22:00), a realistic expectation for this season (24:00), why Kevin Stefanski is uniquely qualified to weather the Watson drama (27:00), what it’s like to cover the Watson beat as a woman (34:00), and if Baker Mayfield could have been the Browns starter under different circumstances (35:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
